Embers.Description:
# Embers #
Invest <:zAmethyst:1243933389262684212> Amethyst Embers, <:zAquamarine:1243933938859114537> Aquamarine Embers, or <:zAmber:1243933695081975930> Amber Embers into bosses to receive special rewards. However, the more embers you invest, the harder the boss fight becomes.

<:zAmethyst:1243933389262684212> **Amethyst Embers**
- 50 Embers
 - Monsters' life +50%
 - Monsters' damage reduction +5
 - Monsters additionally drop 250000 Gold(s). 
- 100 Embers
 - Monsters' life +150%
 - Monsters' damage reduction +10
 - Monsters aditionally drop 2 Weathered Hephaestite(s).
- 150 Embers
 - Monsters' life +300%
 - Monsters' damage reduction +20
 - Monsters additionally drop 1 Boss Card(s). 
- 200 Embers
 - Monsters' life +500%
 - Monster's damage reduction +30
 - Number of projectiles is increased by 1.
 - Previous Reward(s) & Monsters additionally drop 1 Volcanic Hephaestites(s).
- 250 Embers
 - Monsters' life +1000%
 - Monster's damage reduction +40
 - Number of projectiles is increased by 2.
 - Previous Reward(s) & Monsters additionally drop 1 Volcanic Hephaestites(s).
- 300 Embers
 - Monsters' life +2000%
 - Monster's damage reduction +50
 - Number of projectiles is increased by 3.
 - Previous Reward(s) & Monsters' additionally drop 1 Insane-Quality Equipment(s).

<:zAquamarine:1243933938859114537> **Aquamarine Embers**
- 50 Embers
 - Monsters' damage +20%
 - Monsters' damage reduction +5
 - Monsters additionally drop 500 EsoCircuit(s).
- 100 Embers
 - Monsters' damage +50%
 - Monsters' damage reduction +10
 - Previous Reward(s) & Monsters additionally drop 500 EsoCircuit(s).
- 150 Embers
 - Monsters' damage +100%
 - Monsters' damage reduction +20
 - Previous Reward(s) & Monsters additionally drop 500 EsoCircuit(s).
- 200 Embers
 - Monsters' damage +150%
 - Monsters' damage reduction +30
 - Your resistances -5
 - Previous Reward(s) & Monsters additionally drop 1000 EsoCircuit(s).
- 250 Embers
 - Monsters' damage +250%
 - Monsters' damage reduction +40
 - Your resistances -10
 - Previous Reward(s) & Monsters additionally drop 1000 EsoCircuit(s).
- 300 Embers
 - Monsters' damage +500%
 - Monsters' damage reduction +50
 - Your resistances -15
 - Previous Reward(s) & Monsters' additionally drop 1 Insane-Quality Equipment(s).

<:zAmber:1243933695081975930> **Amber Embers**
- 50 Embers
 - Monsters' attack and movement speed +20%
 - Monsters' damage reduction +5
 - Monsters additionally drop 50 Helxarine(s).
- 100 Embers
 - Monsters' attack and movement speed +50%
 - Monsters' damage reduction +10
 - Previous Reward(s) & Monsters additionally drop 50 Helxarine(s).
- 150 Embers
 - Monsters' attack and movement speed +75%
 - Monsters' damage reduction +20
 - Previous Reward(s) & Monsters additionally drop 50 Helxarine(s).
- 200 Embers
 - Monsters' attack and movement speed +100%
 - Monsters' damage reduction +30
 - Area of effect of monsters' skills +25%
 - Previous Reward(s) & Monsters additionally drop 100 Helxarine(s).
- 250 Embers
 - Monsters' attack and movement speed +150%
 - Monsters' damage reduction +40
 - Area of effect of monsters' skills +50%
 - Previous Reward(s) & Monsters additionally drop 100 Helxarine(s).
- 300 Embers
 - Monsters' attack and movement speed +200%
 - Monsters' damage reduction +50
 - Area of effect of monsters' skills +75%
 - Previous Reward(s) & Monsters' additionally drop 1 Insane-Quality Equipment(s).

Chips.Description:
You can apply a chip you own to chip slots on cybermod equipment 
Chips are not consumed when applied
Different pieces of equipment can equip different type of chips, each having a different effect and gives different base stats
If there are repeated chips equipped, only one with the highest level will take effect
You can dismantle excess chips for parts

Levels.Description:
+1 computability per level
Upgrade effect per odd number level [Lv 1,3,5,7]
Double base stat per even number level [Lv 2,4,6]
```Level 1-2 - Uncommon(Green)
Level 3-4 - Rare(Blue)
Level 5-6 - Epic(Purple)Level 7 - Legendary(Yellow)```

Upgrading.Description: Chips can be upgraded to the next level by merging 3 of the same chip

Circle Chip (Accessory).Description:
**Effects:**
Gives one of 5 abilities [equip in quick (potion) slot] 
Ability lv 1|1|2|2|3|3|4

**Possible abilities:** 
**Teleport**
	Teleport to a location
	Skill level reduces CD
**Heal**
	Heal % of HP over time
	2.5s duration
	Skill level increases effect and reduces CD
**Hologram projection**
	Make a hologram projection of an enemy with a % of hp
	Transfer a % of hologram dmg taken to the original
	Skill level increases effect
**Cooldown reduction**
	Reduce a % of other skills CD
	16s cd
	Skill level increases effect
**Aura**
	Create an aura that reduces ally damage taken and increases ally damage dealt
	Skill level increases effect
**Stats:**
	Regular:
		Def +0|15|15|30|30|60|60
	Mutated:
		Ability gains 1 of 3 prefixes which gives special effect
		(Chance different based on gear base stat type)
		Def +0|10|10|20|20|40|40

Square Chip (Armor).Description:
**Effects:**
Upgrade levels of an unlocked skill
The listed skill will change depending on your current class
Skill lv +1|1|2|2|3|3|4 (Can go over Lv4, increase ratio remains same)
Stats:
	Str/Dex/Int +0|20|20|40|40|80|80

Triangle Chip (Weapon).Description:
**Effects:**
Increase level of FBs on weapon
	Uncommon(Green) Chip: Listed FB level +1
	Rare(Blue) Chip: Listed FB level +1, listed FB level extra +1 if the weapon has the listed fb
	Epic(Purple) Chip: Listed FB level +2, other FB on weapon +1 if the weapon has the listed fb
	Legendary(Yellow) Chip: Listed FB level +2, other FB on weapon +2 if the weapon has the listed fb
Stats:
	Regular FB:
		Attack/Magic +0|30|30|60|60|120|120
	Boss FB:
		Attack/Magic +0|40|40|80|80|160|160

Obtainment method.Description:
Hologram Chest
Mechanical (Key) Chest
Dismantling Cybermod Equipment (of same chip)
Accessories:
	75% Mutated (Prefix chance based on base stat type)
	25% Regular
Armors:
	Helmet: left base class skill chip
	Chestplate: right base class skill chip
	Boots: combined class skill chip

Apex Level System.Description:
Apex levels are extra levels unlocked after you reach level 60 The maximum apex level is 125 Apex levels give 1 apex point per level, which you can spend on a stat (str/dex/int) to gain 2 of the stat For every 5 apex points spent on each stat up to 25, you receive an extra stats modifier Apex nodes, unlocked at lv 5, 15 and 25 apex points on each stat, can be upgraded with helxarine to give stats modifier and helxar corruption related buffs

Apex levels are shared across characters If you have not yet reached lv50 on a seasonal character, the maximum amount of apex points active in each stat will be equal to [Level]/2, and all of your seasonal characters will regain all bonus from apex levels when any seasonal character reaches lv50

Cards Infographic.Description: Outdated, only Mystraea, and Esoteria maps from S0

Boss Timings.Description:
Timezone independent where you download the app in

**Note**
Black Archknight appears on Heroic Difficulty, and you can't cheat your in game time) Updated as of S2

New Class.Description:
Is obtainable through the current season <:s2medallion:1230829619951964160> Gold Medallion (Battlepass), purchased with 360<:zFishChip:1187175256595644446> At the end of the season, it will become unlockable via 500<:zGem:1187175259179339776> from the <:GemMerchant:1228803994131103815> Gem Merchant

Currently Voidfarer is the one locked in the Battlepass and <:pcAnimancer:1171466348329701427> Animancer, and <:pcHerbalist:1198104735115386982> Herbalist are available for purchase with <:zGem:1187175259179339776>

Insane.Description:
- Fatebounds are based on dungeon, unless it has a Fixed Fatebound. Daily Invite gives a random fatebound.
- For more information on their fatebounds, use the command >>fb [fatebound/item name]
- Helhearts are a more common Insane Rarity Item with 9 variations and random fatebounds.
 - They are obtainable on Affixed Dungeons or Helxar Touched Dungeons. For more information on their effects use !q Helheart

Debuffs.Description: List of Debuffs and their Effects

Bug Report.Description:
# Bug Report 
Staff and Moderators of this Discord Server can't help you with your in game concerns. You can post your bug report at https://discord.com/channels/971700371112198194/1169171096793251900 or email it at `info@chillyroom.games` with this format: 
1. State the name of the game if sending by email to avoid confusion 
2. Description of the bug 
3. Device model & Operating system 
Account ID/Player ID 
Add screenshot or record the bug encountered

XP.Description:
# Discord Server XP 
Image permission is provided through XP roles. To post media, you must be at least a Veteran Adventurer, given at 5000 xp. XP is given at a random amount between 20-50 xp, which is earned per minute of chatting â€”- you can check your rank in https://discord.com/channels/971700371112198194/1105759325806411796 with `t!rank`. https://discord.com/channels/971700371112198194/972442301760684082, https://discord.com/channels/971700371112198194/1186653355158810684 & https://discord.com/channels/971700371112198194/975586078880858132 has universal media permsission.
